website_summaries.verdict: Provides adequate protection in a bare bones package. Adequate for families on a budget and those who need a car seat only occasionally.
pros: Less bulky than some other seats we've reviewed
cons: Installed seat wiggles from side to side a bit, but this slight movement has no effect on the seat's federal safety rating

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat! I’ve tried it on my 1 year old niece, 2 year old, and my 5 year old and it works perfect for them all. I thought it would be too big to fit in my car with 2 other car seats but it works perfect! It’s one of my new favorites and I’ll definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Product came in box without plastic so the carseat was filthy and the side plastic was scratched upon arrival. The headrest is very flimsy and moves more than the Graco model I got for my older son. I ordered a replacement and recommended that they use plastic to cover the carseat when shipping, but the replacement also came without a plastic covering and was filthy. I returned both carseats and got another Graco 4ever DLX. I do not recommend this carseat for lack of safety features and cleanliness. Mother of 3 under 5 here, take my word for it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Three-year-old now comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a tall 3-yr old who was squished in his old car seat. This one is perfect. Seems to have excellent head support and the cup holders are nice. Since he has to use a seat until age 4, this was a nice upgrade for us.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorType

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The base on this absolutely sucks. It’s hard to adjust the crotch snap because you have to take it apart all the way to booster mode. I hate this car seat and wish I would have just bought another britax one4life
customer_reviews.author: jp p.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Reliable, SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this carseat so much we have 2! One for the babysitter and one for us. Installation takes a matter of minutes, so easy, and I feel good knowing it has side impact protection. One of the things i love most about it is the larger tray that sits in the cup holder so my son can reach his snack easily. Additionally, it's such a good value especially knowing you can use the seat from the day they are born until over 100 pounds! That's a ton of use so you can really feel good about purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Made in China ... Not US!
customer_reviews.text: We passed on several other low-priced options to avoid buying a Made in China product, and picked this one since it clearly said in the product information that this is made in US. Got the package today and it had a Made in China sticker right on top. Feel absolutely cheated!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonNYC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking car seat & super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, shipping was extremely fast. I was very impressed. This car seat is absolutely the best seat I’ve ever purchased. It is very durable & my daughter said it’s the most comfortable one she’s ever had. It was very easy to install as well. The chest clips are super comfortable. My daughter loves the snack tray. I am loving the fact that this seat will last her for another few years. Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fissell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My son is so comfortable in this! It is easy to install, secure and the padding makes a huge difference from other seats we’ve tried. It also keeps his head and a good position if he falls asleep on our rides which is huge!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley mann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it so much... He falls asleep to it every time he gets in it... the car seat actually grow as he grows...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the comfort of this seat. My five month old falls asleep within minutes on being in it. It was slightly challenging to install and I needed my husbands help.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Too loose in the seat of the car
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this purchase but it was impossible to tighten enough when putting it in the car. I even took it to a fire station to see if they could help me and no one could get it tightened enough. When I would wiggle it, it would move about a foot back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest car seat we have had!
customer_reviews.text: The Evenflo Everyfit car seat is so easy to install. We love the East to use lower anchor connectors that are easy to install and also easy to take out if the seat needs to be moved. We are using the seat rear facing for our 17 month old and the recline is so simple to adjust. The cup holder also comes with a little snack tray which is removable for quick clean. The height can also be adjusted quickly if needed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The only seat I'll need until the kids are grown!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat and so do my niece and nephew. The video chat installation was enormously helpful and ensured I correctly installed the seat. The kids (ages 5 and 2) love the comfort of this seat and have toys, snack and drinks easily in reach with two cupholders for all their things. The seat design is nicely done as well and the cushions and fabrics are very easy to clean. Can't recommend highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M DeThomaso

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but couldn’t install properly in car
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Could not get the latch straps tight enough to safely secure in car. I had several other people try and tried in two other vehicles, talked to costumer service and watched videos and just couldn't get tight enough. product itself seems really nice but the base doesn’t seem sturdy enough
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my nephew. No complaint and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Warner J

customer_reviews.title: The perfect car seat
customer_reviews.text: It took me minute to install but once I got it in my 2019 Hyundai Elantra it was a perfect fit! My daughter used to hate getting in her car seat but now she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sage McCammon

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Evenflo for another great product! This was easy to install, fits snugly and looks great. Love that it will stay with my child through every growth phase. Most importantly, I can tell that it is providing very good protection for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 month old, who grow out her car-seat . Love it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Need to fix the buckle problem. It gets frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I found it is very difficult to buckle. It can be a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to install into our car.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get it installed and it’s a hassle if you need to change it from car to car. Yet, i do like it and my one year old loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: No hassle shipping to my sons address.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my unborn grandchild. My daughter in law loved it so it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Novia Blair

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable baby loves it doesn’t fuss in the back at all while in it
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: First newborn
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift. I bet it’s going to get a lot of wear out of it. Mom and Dad was happy to get it and Dad took a while, but we all got to learn
customer_reviews.author: hermionetwin22

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product my daughters seat always changing or moving around in the vehicle's seat the recline has the child.laykng all the way back.so far you can see the top of the head from the front .....wished I would've read all the reviews before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Inclined when rear facing
customer_reviews.text: Is there a way to have it sit back a bit more when it’s rear facing? It seems to be way high for my baby. Besides that everything else is perfect. My baby seems to be comfortable but I feel it’s way inclined
customer_reviews.author: J.J. (Juan José)

customer_reviews.title: Harness won’t get tight
customer_reviews.text: The reason why i gave this 2 stars is because the harness is impossible to tighten. I wish i had the box to return it. I don’t feel safe with my baby driving in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is less than ideal. There is only one reclining position for the car seat to be rear facing. The car seat kind of wobbles on the base rear facing and it is hard to secure the seat nice and tight. The seat takes up more room in the car rear facing, and the driver/passenger seat needs to be pulled forward. There is almost no padding on the babies back, it seems uncomfortable. The Grace Slimfit we own is a similar price point and a way nicer seat. I would not buy this car seat again, and would not recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Vtrunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is perfect. I have a 14 month old grand daughter that is tall and ready to face front and this works for us. The adjustability with the back to keep her comfortable is a plus. When she falls sleep her head is positioned well and not hanging forward in the car seat. Threat straps are adjustable to fit her and they come with belt pads that is also a plus. It fits perfectly in my Prius with no problems. It is very nice to have a cup holder where she can place her sippy cup. I like this car seat because she wil have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bettieboop49

customer_reviews.title: Nice lines, good padding
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how plush and good looking this car seat was -- similar to much more expensive car seats. It was not as easy to install as a Britax Boulevard (my favorite convertible), but once installed it was anchored firmly. My toddler said she was comfortable in it. The fabric is lush and machine-washable (a must!). I would not use this convertible (or any other) for an infant: I had my babies in bucket seats until they were 10-12 months -- it was cozier and more maneuverable. Still, this 4-in-1 car seat has the ability to protect a kid since s/he's a newborn weighing 4lbs until s/he's a kid of 120 lbs, in its different configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Mido

customer_reviews.title: really great especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice especially since it isn't that expensive. It's plush and seems comfortable. It's sturdy. It wasn't that bad to install. The features like the tilt are really nice. It's a no rethread harness. (The harness goes up as the headrest goes up). It's not terribly heavy, but it's not not one you'll be carrying so weight doesn't matter. It's not narrow, so the wideness is the only reason I wouldn't suggest this. (We have 5 kids, so fitting multiple car seats has been an issue at times in our life!) I really like this. A lot of the cheapest seem like they'd be uncomfortable. This seems to have as nice padding as high end car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Safe & Grows With Child
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is just ideal! It can be used for children from infancy until early childhood. It's attractive and well made. Whoever designed this car seat is a genius. The car seat came equipped with instructions, cups, security pieces plus a snack tray. Another plus point is that the padding can be removed for easy cleaning. The double cup holders were added brilliance and they can easily be cleaned as well. Having additional car seats is a Godsend if you have another vehicle or if you have young children visiting and need a safe place for them to ride. This car seat is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: BeatleBangs1964

customer_reviews.title: Once it's installed, it's great
customer_reviews.text: Getting the carseat adjusted and ready to install took a lot of work. The instructions are not super clear and finding what you need in the booklet is quite a pain. Actually adjusting the seat is physically difficult. But once you get it set to how you want it, it installs easily and securely. It's very comfortable and is a great seat that will last a long time, all the way until the kid no longer needs a booster.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Heather Hejduk

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My niece has been using this for hew new son. She speaks very highly of this seat for it's ease of use and comfort. It easily installs and then uninstalls when they reach their destination. So far, she has had zero complaints and when I first got it, her first remark was that she KNEW it would be great because Evenflo is always the best. Keeping the kiddos safe and comfy is so important. Nobody wants to drive with a fussy baby in the back. In this seat, he plays with his feet and coos until he dozes off. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo DiBella

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  really nice car seat for our two year old toddler.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this since early this year and love this car seat. First, it's simply great looking. Very comfortable and easy to set the level of the chair in our vehicles that range from a small SUV to full-size pickup trucks. Has ended all the squirming and crying she feels like a big kid now in this. Love the ability, of course, to keep sippy cups easily accessible so mommy doesn't have to turn around while driving (which we don't) Fabric is soft and great feeling on the skin, also an overall sleek look for boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: PasoCreek

customer_reviews.title: My preschooler likes it
customer_reviews.text: We use this car seat for my mother in laws car because it's super easy to install! we just clip it in using the back hooks in her van. I noticed that my three-year-old didn't complain about her back hurting when she was in the car, the Graco car seat hurts her back. The side padding is also great because she's always falling asleep in the car seat and now her head rests comfortably. I wish however it had the little side bubble that shows you when the seat is balanced correctly. I'm also not sure how I'm supposed to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable at all stages
customer_reviews.text: This seat is super comfortable in all positions, very well padded and designed. It's easy to install and to adjust when needed. Besides the 4-in-one adjustments, there are a bunch of headrest positions as your child grows. I love that it's so easy to clean the cover and the snack cup trays are removable and washable. SO much more cost-effective to get this instead of an infant car seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t tighten
customer_reviews.text: I could not for the life of me get this installed in my 2020 VW Jetta. I tried rear facing and it was still moving about 3 inches so figured maybe it’s more for forward facing and I turned it around and the top latch WOULDNT tighten I could Pinch it but I’d pull and pull and nothing. And the car seat was still moving 6 inches each way.
customer_reviews.author: Lily R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is incredibly easy to install. It is even easier to adjust, and it is very comfortable. My 3 year old LOVES it! I love that it adjusts so simply. Really, this car seat is all you need from newborn to 5-6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box and scuffed car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Did I buy a used car seat was my first thought looking at the box, now normally not a big deal banged up box, but the seat wasn’t in plastic or anything to protect it considering how the box was treated I can only imagine what damage the seat itself took. It wasn’t in a plastic bag or any semblance of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This seat is convenient and easy to use. It’s fairly lightweight and my little one is super comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Foam on Headrest is not good
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product the safety aspect of the head support is flimsy and just by placing the cover back on after washing it, it broke off on one side with barely touching it, how am i to trust this product to keep my kiddo safe if it breaks by placing the cover back on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin

customer_reviews.title: Buckle not working
customer_reviews.text: Clips don't want click into place on the groin buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing car seat! Our son is very comfortable and secure in the car seat! My wife and I love the seat. Paola and Jonathan white
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN WHITE

product_meta.title: EveryFit 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Olympus
product_meta.description:
Color:OlympusThe Evenflo EveryFit 4-In-1 Convertible Car Seat has been engineered for maximum comfort, safety, and longevity. The EveryFit accommodates your child by adjusting to multiple positions, allowing kids to ride rear-facing beyond 2 years of age—without extending the seat or cramping other passengers. This all-in-one car seat provides a safe and secure ride for up to a decade. Parents and grandparents love how easy it is to use the quick and secure SureSafe Installation System. SureSafe includes easy to use connectors and a set of LATCH guides– which improves proper installation by 2X (compared to standard LATCH installations). It can be used as a rear-facing car seat with harness, forward-facing car seat with harness, belt-positioning high-back booster, and no-back booster that helps keep children 4 - 120 lb secure while riding in a vehicle. The EveryFit meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards and Evenflo’s side impact standard, with advanced side impact protection that reduces crash forces up to 30%. It is designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2X the federal crash test standard. Evenflo works with parents to develop child-safety products that are designed for how they are actually used. We’ve developed this 4-in-1 car seat with comfort, safety and ease-of-use in mind. The one-hand, 12-position headrest and no-rethread harness enable a proper fit during each ride and as child grows – without uninstalling the car seat. For additional convenience, this all-in-one car seat is designed with removable cushions, machine-washable fabrics, two integrated cup holders with removable snack tray.

For 100 years, Evenflo has been a trusted source of precision-manufactured, high-quality children products that are engineered for real-life situations. Evenflo takes a proactive approach to the design of each of our multi-mode products for extended use or multiple-use applications, which saves you money without compromising the safety of your children. Additionally, all Evenflo car seats include ParentLink customer-service perks like real-time chat and free live video installation support.
feature_bullets: 10 YEARS OF USE: The Evenflo EveryFit 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat offers protection for up to 10 years. The EveryFit is an infant, convertible, high-back booster, and no-back booster seat to provide safety and longevity for your growing child.
The four modes include (1) Rear facing with harness: Weight: 4 - 40 lbs with three recline positions
FORWARD FACING WITH HARNESS: Weight: 22 - 65 lb. Age: For child at least 2 years old;
HIGH-BACK BOOSTER: Weight: 40 - 120 lb. Age: For child at least 4 years old
NO-BACK BOOSTER: Weight 40 - 120 lb. Age: For child at least 4 years old.

SAFETY IS A PRIORITY: The EveryFit meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards and Evenflo’s side impact standard, with advanced side impact protection that reduces crash forces up to 30%.

For a quick, secure installation, SureSafe Installation System includes easy to use connectors and a set of LATCH guides– which improves proper installation by 2X (compared to standard LATCH installations).
COMFORT: Innovative air flow mesh fabrics are designed to keep your child cool. Four recline positions angles your child comfortably- 3 rear-facing positions and 1 forward facing.
PROPER FIT: Ideal for a convertible car seat, the one-handed, 12-position headrest and easy to slide no-rethread harness straps can adjust as your child grows without uninstalling the car seat.
CONVENIENCE: Machine-washable fabrics are easy to remove for cleaning. Dual integrated cup holders with removable snack tray to put drinks and snacks within arm’s reach.

specifications.Care instructions: Cleaning Instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
